issue.message: On SDK version 23 and up, your app data will be automatically backed up, and restored on app install. Your GCM regid will not work across restores, so you must ensure that it is excluded from the back-up set. Use the attribute `android:fullBackupContent` to specify an `@xml` resource which configures which files to backup. More info: https://developer.android.com/training/backup/autosyncapi.html
This folder configuration (`v24`) is unnecessary; `minSdkVersion` is 24. Merge all the resources in this folder into `drawable`.
App is not indexable by Google Search; consider adding at least one Activity with an ACTION-VIEW intent filter. See issue explanation for more details.
Hardcoded string "Switch State", should use `@string` resource
